creator: Creator
description-tagging-records: The central data type of ETS, a tagging record describes who (tagger) tagged what (target) with what (tags), where (relayer), when, and why (record type). This provides a universal structure for recording all relevant details of a tagging action.
description-creators: Wallets that have created a tag via a relayer either directly or when a tagging record is created. Identifies the originators of tags, ensuring proper attribution.
description-create-tag: Create a new tokenized tag string that can be linked with targets in tagging records. Each tag is unique and can be reused across many tagging records, ensuring consistency and reusability in the tagging system.
description-create-tagging-record: Create a new tagging record, the central data type of ETS. Specify who (tagger) is tagging what (target) with which tags, where (relayer), when, and why (record type). This action creates an immutable record of a tagging action on the blockchain.
description-owners: Wallets that own tags by purchasing them at ETS auction or via the secondary market.
description-relayers: Relayers host the creation of new tagging records. Only relayers can write tagging records to ETS core. Relayers are essential intermediaries that facilitate and validate the creation of tagging records on the blockchain.
description-tags: Tokenized tag strings that can be linked with targets in tagging records. Only one token exists per tag string. Tag tokens (e.g., '#love') can be reused across many tagging records. Ensures uniqueness and reusability of tags, enabling them to be consistently referenced across multiple records.
description-taggers: Wallets that have created a tagging record via a relayer. Identifies the entities responsible for tagging actions, distinct from the tag creators.
description-targets: URLs that are linked with tags in a tagging record. Specifies the digital assets or resources being tagged, creating an immutable linkage in the tagging system.
invalid-tag-message: Invalid tag format. Tags must start with a #, contain no spaces, and be between 2 and 32 characters long (excluding the #).
name: Name
relayer-add-tags-required: Must own tag to create relayer
tag-already-exists: This tag already exists. Please enter a different tag.
testnet-warning: This is a test network. Tokens have no value. Testnet is not finalized and may be reset at anytime.
this-tag-already-exists-please-enter-a-d: This tag already exists. Please enter a different tag.

TXN.DOUBLE_CHECK: Double check these details before confirming in your wallet.

ERROR.MIN_THREE_CHARACTERS: The string must contain at least three characters
ERROR.NO_TAGS: Must own CTAG to create Relayer

AUCTION.SETTLE_INFO: Settling transfers tag to new owner & releases next tag for auction
